alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 4:36AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Simpson, Lincoln, Lawrence, eastern Franklin, Copiah and northwestern Jefferson Davis Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 435 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dry Grove to 7 miles south of Bude. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Crystal Springs around 445 AM CDT. Center Point and Hopewell around 505 AM CDT. Harrisville around 520 AM CDT. Bogue Chitto around 525 AM CDT. Enterprise around 530 AM CDT. Mendenhall and Ruth around 540 AM CDT. Jayess, Topeka and Martinville around 545 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include New Hebron, D`Lo, Silver Creek, Beauregard, Braxton and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson
